name: kalmanjs
description: A small library implementing the principle of Kalman filters, without any dependencies, to filter out noise in 1D systems.

scripts.minify: npx uglifyjs dist/kalman.js --beautify "beautify=false, preamble='/*kalmanjs, Wouter Bulten, MIT, https://github.com/wouterbulten/kalmanjs */'" --compress --source-map "content='dist/kalman.js.map'" --mangle -o dist/kalman.min.js

author: Wouter Bulten (https://wouterbulten.nl)
